name: Welcome To Stayat
description:
Driving around in vaguely eastern Europe you have become lost in a snowstorm. But you kind of don't care.

Use W to accelerate, A and D to steer, Space to brake and S to reverse (which only works from stand still right now)

E will skip song and Esc bring up the menu.

Mouse is used to move camera around.

There is no goal or objective, just drive around and look at the art submitted by contributors and listen to music that has also been submitted by contributors:

Music from:

Hum and Shelter-one

Art by:

No-Waves

HopperUk

Azza Bamboo

sh

HaroSoda

Allison Banks

The game has some issues that need fixing: The camera is wonky and is hard to use to look at the bigger art pieces.

The fog and lighting aren't quite right.

The car really needs a reset button when you get stuck.

S should brake.

Some more props around the place would be nice.
